TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi WindowsFormsHost extends System.Windows.Interop.HwndHost implements class System.Windows.Interop.IKeyboardInputSink
type WindowsFormsHost = class inherit HwndHost interface IKeyboardInputSink

summary.span: 可讓您將 Windows Forms 控制項裝載於 WPF 頁面上的元素。

span.span: An element that allows you to host a Windows Forms control on a WPF page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用放置 Windows Form 控制項，您的 WPF 項目或網頁中的項目。Use the element to place a Windows Forms control within your WPF element or page. 若要裝載 Windows Form 控制項或表單中的 WPF 項目，使用控制項。To host a WPF element in a Windows Forms control or form, use the control. > [!NOTE] > WindowsFormsIntegration.dll 會隨[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]組件。WindowsFormsIntegration.dll is installed with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] assemblies. 組件的預設位置是 %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll。The default location for the assembly is %programfiles%\Reference Assemblies\Microsoft\Framework\v3.0\WindowsFormsIntegration.dll. 若要裝載的 Windows Form 控制項中的 WPF 項目，您必須指派 Windows Form 控制項屬性。To host a Windows Forms control in a WPF element, you must assign the Windows Forms control to the property. 使用屬性來指派自訂對應之間項目和其裝載的 Windows Forms 控制項。Use the property to assign custom mappings between a element and its hosted Windows Forms control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## XAML 物件項目用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用項目來裝載控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a element to host a control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 在 WPF 中所使用的 XAML 的 Windows Form 控制項裝載](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-windows-forms-control-in-wpf-by-using-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting a Windows Forms Control in WPF by Using XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-a-windows-forms-control-in-wpf-by-using-xaml.md). [!code-xaml[HostingWfInWpfWithXaml#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingWfInWpfWithXaml/CSharp/HostingWfInWpf/Window1.xaml#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個相依性屬性由欄位。This dependency property is identified by the field. 根據預設，這個屬性會對應至更新和託管控制項的屬性。By default, this property is mapped to update the and properties of the hosted control. 如需有關對應屬性，請參閱 < [Windows Forms 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information on mapping the property, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 取得或設定由 所裝載的子控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets the child control hosted by the element.

value.span: 裝載的 Windows Forms 控制項。

span.span: The hosted Windows Forms control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有一個子控制項可以裝載，但是可以有任意數目的子系。Only one child control can be hosted, but can have any number of children. 子控制項不能是最上層的表單。The child control cannot be a top-level form. 如果已，表單屬性設定為`false`。If is a , the form's property is set to `false`. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage `<` *物件* `>``<` *object* `>` `<` *hostedControl* `.../>``<` *hostedControl* `.../>` ```` ## XAML 值XAML Values *object**object* A元素 （或 可能的子類別）。A element (or a possible subclass). *hostedControl**hostedControl* 指定裝載的 Windows Forms 控制項的項目。An element that specifies the hosted Windows Forms control. 指定在標記中的自訂控制項通常需要 xmlns 對應，請參閱[XAML 命名空間和 WPF XAML 命名空間對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。Specifying the custom control in markup usually requires an xmlns mapping, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用要加入至裝載的控制項屬性項目。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to add the hosted control to the element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 在 WPF 中的 ActiveX 控制項裝載](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-an-activex-control-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting an ActiveX Control in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-an-activex-control-in-wpf.md). [!code-csharp[HostingAxInWpf#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingAxInWpf/CSharp/HostingAxInWpf/window1.xaml.cs#11)] [!code-vb[HostingAxInWpf#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HostingAxInWpf/VisualBasic/HostingAxInWpf/window1.xaml.vb#11)]

summary.span: 從 WPF 以非強制回應的方式開啟 時，讓它可以正確運作。

span.span: Enables a to function correctly when it is opened modelessly from WPF.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，以轉送所有鍵盤訊息modelessly 開啟。Call the method to forward all keyboard messages when a is opened modelessly. 方法，會安裝 「 訊息篩選條件所需的非強制回應表單開啟 WPF 時正確運作。The method installs a message filter that is required for modeless forms to function correctly when opened by WPF. 您必須呼叫這個方法一次特定執行個體。You need to call this method only once for a particular instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性設定會影響其範本會使用屬性做為參數的控制項。This property setting affects only those controls whose template uses the property as a parameter. 其不會影響其他控制項。It has no effect on other controls. 這個相依性屬性由欄位。This dependency property is identified by the field. 根據預設，這個屬性會對應至更新託管控制項的屬性。By default, this property is mapped to update the property of the hosted control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 覆寫 的基底類別實作，測量 物件的大小，然後傳回正確的大小給配置引擎。

span.span: Overrides the base class implementation of to measure the size of a object and return proper sizes to the layout engine.
The desired size of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 WPF 版面配置的大小條件約束是硬式條件約束。Size constraints in WPF layout are hard constraints. 如果超過限制，主機必須裁剪內容內裝載的區域。If the constraints are exceeded, the host must clip the content within the hosted region. 此方法的實作會強制執行此行為。The implementation of this method enforces this behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PropertyMap As PropertyMap

summary.span: 取得屬性對應，以此判斷 項目上的設定屬性如何影響所裝載的 Windows Forms 控制項。

span.span: Gets the property map that determines how setting properties on the element affects the hosted Windows Forms control.

value.span: A存取子可對應上裝載 Windows Forms 控制項屬性的屬性。

span.span: A that maps properties to properties on the hosted Windows Forms control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Form 和 WPF 技術有兩個類似但不同屬性的模型。The Windows Forms and WPF technologies have two similar but different property models. *屬性對應*支援的兩個架構之間的互通性。*Property mapping* supports interoperation between the two architectures. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何加入的對應屬性設控制項。The following code example shows how to add a mapping for the property to a control. [!code-csharp[PropertyMappingWithWfh#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithWfhSample/CSharp/PropertyMappingWithWfh/Window1.xaml.cs#12)] [!code-vb[PropertyMappingWithWfh#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PropertyMappingWithWfhSample/VisualBasic/PropertyMappingWithWfh/Window1.xaml.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Windows.Vector ScaleChild(valuetype System.Windows.Vector newScale) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function ScaleChild (newScale As Vector) As Vector
abstract member ScaleChild : System.Windows.Vector -> System.Windows.Vector override this.ScaleChild : System.Windows.Vector -> System.Windows.Vector

span.span: The new scale factor.

summary.span: 縮放裝載的 Windows Forms 控制項，並且追蹤比例因素。

span.span: Scales the hosted Windows Forms control, and tracks the scale factor.

returns.span: ，代表套用到裝載之 Windows Forms 控制項的比例因素。

span.span: A which represents the scale factor applied to the hosted Windows Forms control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Form 控制項不支援與 WPF 項目相同的方式調整規模。Windows Forms controls do not support scaling in the same way as WPF elements. 比方說，調整到 0.5 倍 1 倍的 Windows Form 控制項，並回到 1 倍不會一般情況下，復原之控制項的原始大小。For example, scaling a Windows Forms control from a factor of 1 to a factor of 0.5 and back to a factor of 1 does not, in general, recover the original size of the control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [WindowsFormsHost 元素的配置考量](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout-considerations-for-the-windowsformshost-element.md)。For more information, see [Layout Considerations for the WindowsFormsHost Element](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/layout-considerations-for-the-windowsformshost-element.md). 覆寫方法，以提供裝載 Windows Forms 控制項的自訂的調整行為。Override the method to provide custom scaling behavior for the hosted Windows Forms control.

summary.span: 取得或設定裝載控制項的定位點索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the hosted control's tab index.

value.span: TAB 導覽和焦點的定位點索引。

span.span: The tab index for tab navigation and focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個相依性屬性由欄位。This dependency property is identified by the field. 若要變更在表單上的控制項之間的定位巡覽順序中使用這個屬性。Use this property to change the order of tab navigation among the controls on a form. 具有較低的定位點索引的控制項將會收到具有更高的索引的控制項之前的焦點。A control with a lower tab index will get focus before a control with a higher index. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

span.span: A that specifies the focus behavior.

summary.span: 將焦點從 WPF 轉送至裝載的 Windows Forms 控制項。

span.span: Forwards focus from WPF to the hosted Windows Forms control.

returns.span: 如果已啟動控制項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if a control was activated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當項目收到 索引標籤上的命令，從方法，在中的第一個符合資格控制收到焦點。When a element receives a TAB command from the method, the first eligible control in receives focus. 所指定的第一個控制項`request`參數。The first control is specified by the `request` parameter. 當`request`是，行為會類似於按下 TAB 鍵。When `request` is , the behavior is similar to pressing the TAB key. 當`request`是，行為會類似於按下 SHIFT + TAB。When `request` is , the behavior is similar to pressing SHIFT+TAB.
